text: "More Than a Memory" is a recorded by American country music artist Garth Brooks. It was released in August 27, 2007 as the first single from his third compilation album The Ultimate Hits. ==Music video== The music video was directed by Jon Small, and premiered on CMT on November 1, 2007, during CMT's Top 20 Countdown. It debuted at number 9 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of November 8, 2007. ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:Garth Brooks songs
title: More Than a Memory
